name: R3-T6 (Arthree-Teesix)
Lore: 'R3 units have larger memory and more advanced circuitry than their R1 predecessors, allowing for more efficient astrogation plots. R3-T6 served on the Death Star.',
Text: 'While aboard a capital starship, adds 1 to power and 2 to hyperspeed, and that starship is immune to attrition < 4. While at Death Star: Central Core, hyperspeed of Death Star system = 2.',
